title: The Hunting of Wilberforce Pike
description: "A hard, huge hand grasped the scruff of his neck. He was lifted quickly and thrust headfirst into a sack." This was Oliver's rough introduction to the carroty whiskered Wilberforce Pike, the notorious cat thief. Rescued by the motley Power Station gang, Oliver joins in an hilarious romp through the streets of London, up and over the hills and dales of the Lake District seeking revenge.
author: Molly Lefebure
